Package org.openscience.cdk.interfaces

Interface IAminoAcid

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, IAtomContainer, ICDKObject, IChemObject, IChemObjectListener, IMonomer
All Known Implementing Classes:
AminoAcid, AminoAcid, DebugAminoAcid
public interface IAminoAcid extends IMonomer
A AminoAcid is Monomer which stores additional amino acid specific informations, like the N-terminus atom.
Author:
Egon Willighagen <e.willighagen@science.ru.nl>
Source code:
main
Belongs to CDK module:
interfaces
Keywords:
amino acid
Created on:
2005-12-05
